dc_title_s: A large Draught of the Mallabar coast : from Bassalore to Cape Comaroone.
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:1,250,000 ; (E 74째18'00"--E 77째39'00"/N 13째25'00"--N 7째59'00"). Depths shown by soundings. Likely from: Sea-Atlas by Samuel Thornton. In corner on verso: 24. Oriented with north to the left. Flags indicate which nations have factories along the coast.|43 x 53 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:1,250,000|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
